body:
### Welcome.

Hi, I'm Leighton.  Currently living in RVA (Richmond, VA) with my wife Jolie and 2-year old son Dillon.  I spend my days hacking code and running the development team for (Getloaded)[http://getloaded.com], a load board for the transportation industry.  We help truckers find loads to carry, and help brokers find trucks to carry their loads.  When I'm not working I enjoy cycling, playing guitar, riding motorcycles, and spending time with my family.

Stay tuned for more info to come...
